name: The Unproposed Guy
title: A story of Kevin, who explores his talents in stand-up comedy and rapping while navigating unrequited love and self-discovery.

name: The Boy Who Loved
title: A touching story of Raghu, who carries the emotional burden of a tragic past while finding love with a girl who helps him heal.

name: I Too Had a Love Story
title: A deeply personal and emotional tale of love and loss, based on the author's own life experiences..

name: Fasting, Feasting
title: A portrayal of the constraints placed on women in a traditional Indian family, particularly through the character Uma, who is overshadowed by her brother.

name: The Namesake
title: A novel about the challenges faced by a Bengali family as they immigrate to the United States, focusing on cultural identity and generational conflict.

name: A Suitable Boy
title: Set in post-independence India, this is a vast, multi-character novel about Lata and her mother’s quest to find a “suitable boy” for her to marry.
